GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v6.0.18
GSD.description:
x86/MCE/AMD: Clear DFR errors found in THR handler

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit af15b3dbe71da56acc6d8907acd78ab845ddbe6a, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 37d43acfd79f9c53289e9990c344cbd5b4db4bd4. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/MCE/AMD: Clear DFR errors found in THR handler
